item.title: Reel Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone

We are Content Solution agency based in Toronto Canada.

Looking for an editor long term. We have 4-7 videos to edit weekly.

Most of the clients are roofing companies, construction companies, realtors.

Please see the example of edits that we are looking for, hyper engaging, creative, interesting and fresh.

Our budget is $7 per video
Currently we have 5 videos that are needed to be edited, total budget for this week is $35.

Please apply with your portfolio of work.

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/7c9zjvrfi9r6bcrx6rvfg/AC_k2kUrJqtbTdLhHv6DLk4?rlkey=0ip4tr5tlhqjn2mavi337i5ib&st=59zjl2ki&dl=0

These projects are time sensitive hence we will need them finished within 1-2 days of received raw videos from drones and cameras.


THank you!



Budget: $35
Posted On: June 26, 2024 02:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Poland
click to apply

"We are looking forward to the real feedback（video or picture） to accomplish the product niche & upgrade.To have a better communication and build a relationship with customers for the brand.                                                                                
Our products are Lighted makeup mirrors

item.title: Social media manager - Upwork
item.description:
This is what i am after for my social media manager.

I own a SMMA and i am after a person to do one thing or two things.

First they have to be able to use ASANA
Secound they have to be able to speak good English so we can communicate properly
Third they need to have a scheduled uploads software where they can sign in to multiple accounts without having to manually log in and out each time
- They need to be able to schedule a months worth of uploads via Facebook/Instagram and Tik Tok

I have a video editor and a photographer all i require is someone to schedule uploads on the social media platforms above.

- They need to insure that the videos are being uploaded with the correct music and ensure when the video is uploaded it is not cut out
- they need to ensure to add generic captions to each upload relating to the video being uploaded
- they need to ensure to add generic captions to each post and make sure that the captions work
- They need to ensure when uploading via Instagram they add trending audio to the post but at the same time muting that trending audio so that the music being played is actually the original music in the provided video
- They need to ensure they don’t make duplicate uploads

There is an opportunity to also create content for each business i manage but that is reliant upon how well you can create content

I have various Businesses i manage and i would like someone to be able to provide a detailed PDF to give to the photographer to get them to take photos and videos of new and trending content relating to each Buisness in order for the photographer to get the best shots , angles , transitions ect…

I have a team already together and i am currently paying my uploader $5/hour for each project

I have 4 levels of projects for each individual Buisness.

You will be responsible for a minimum of 5 and a maximum of 10-15 projects so there will not be a shortage of work furthermore i pay through WISE.com so once we build a relationship via Upwork that is where you will receive payment for projects with no fees taken out





PACK1 :
1. Create content that needs to be recorded and shot by the photographer using ideas and trends found online once every 2 months (1 Hour)
2. Caption handling and hashtags per post with trending audio (1 hour)
3. Set up automated message something generic (0 hour)
4. Upload the content for the whole month and following month (2 hour)
HOURS= 3

PACK 2:
1. Create content that needs to be recorded and shot by the photographer using ideas and trends found online once every month (1 hour)
2. Caption handling and hashtags per post with trending audio (1 hour)
3. Set up automated message something generic (0 hour)
4. Upload the content for the whole month (1 hour)
HOURS= 3

PACK 3:
1. Create content that needs to be recorded and shot by the photographer using ideas and trends found online once every month (1 hour)
2. Caption handling and hashtags per post with trending audio (1 hour)
3. Set up automated message something generic (0 hour)
4. Upload the content for the month (1 hour)
5. Upload reels for tik Tok refer to upload schedule (1 hour)
6. Reply to all messages and comments once a week when uploading content (1 hour)
7. Extract report from meta for how posts are doing and upload to asana each month. (1 hour)
8. Search for 2 influencers and message them for collaboration once a month (1 hour)
HOURS= 7

PACK 4:
1. Create content that needs to be recorded and shot by the photographer using ideas and trends found online once ever month (1 hour)
2. Caption handling and hashtags per post with trending audio (1 hour)
3. Set up automated message something generic (0 hour)
4. Upload the content for the whole month (1 hour)
5. Upload reels for tik Tok refer to upload schedule. (1 hour)
6. Reply to all messages and comments once a week when uploading content (1 hour)
7. Extract report from meta for how posts are doing and upload to asana each month. (1 hour)
8. Search for 2 influencers and message them for collaboration once a month (1 hour)
9. Upload content for google (1 hour)
HOURS= 8


Post schedule:
Package 1 (All between 2-4pm)
Monday 1 post
Tuesday
Wednesday 1 story
Thursday 1 post
Friday 1 reel
Saturday 1 story
Sunday 1 reel

Package 2-4 (All between 2-4pm)
Monday 1 post
Tuesday 1 reel
Wednesday 1 post / 1 story
Thursday 1 reel / 1 story
Friday 1 post/1 reel
Saturday 1 reel / 1 story
Sunday 1 post / 1 story

Contact me via Instagram to discuss further slicecentral.syd

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 26, 2024 02:37 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: I need someone to make a compelling Youtube ad - Upwork
item.description:
I have several videos that are all Instagram format and I want to use them as hooks and combine them into a longer training I have on youtube

For example

Hook 1 + training
Hook 2 + training
Hook 3 + training
Hook 4+ training

All the videos are filmed but need a little editing and to tie them together Im not lookign for overly edited videos simple and clean

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 26, 2024 02:36 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Advertising, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Video Advertising, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply
